vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀσάλευτος [σᾰ], ον,
unmoved, unshaken, ἀ. ἡ γῆ[Refs 4th c.BC+]; of Delos, [NT+1st c.AD+]; of the sea, probably in [Refs 5th c.BC+]; πίστις[NT]; ἀ. μένειν, of ordinances, [Refs 4th c.AD+]. adverb -τως[Refs 2nd c.BC+]: neuter plural as adverb, χείλεσι ἀσάλευτα μεμυκόσι[Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
unshakable, immovable, fixed
unshaken, immovable, Acts 27:41; metaphorically firm, stable, enduring, fixed Heb. 12:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 不動的 (徒 27:41)
2) 隱喻. 不會被動搖, 穩固的 (來 12:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 不动的 (徒 27:41)
2) 隐喻. 不会被动摇, 稳固的 (来 12:28)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không động đậy được; chẳng thể nhúc nhích; không hề rúng-động
